headline: UBS Reduces Its Price Objective For Duke Energy Corporation (DUK)
summary: Duke Energy Corporation (NYSE:DUK) is among the 8 Most Profitable Utility Stocks to Buy Right Now. According to TheFly, UBS reduced its price objective for Duke Energy Corporation (NYSE:DUK) from $135 to $126 and retained a Neutral rating on December 17, 2025. Separately, on December 16, 2025, Morgan Stanley maintained its Equal Weight rating. The firm […]

headline: How Duke’s Belews Creek Nuclear Bet and Storm-Cost Securitization Could Impact Duke Energy (DUK) Investors
summary: In early January 2026, Duke Energy began implementing customer bill changes in the Carolinas to recover Hurricane Helene costs, harden the grid, and fund generation upgrades, supported by a South Carolina securitization plan expected to save customers more than US$140 million. Ahead of these billing changes, Duke also filed an early site permit with U.S. nuclear regulators for potential next‑generation reactors near its Belews Creek plant, signaling a deeper push into advanced nuclear as...
